s: ^Nice to see you, Elisa! Glad I could catch you for a second. How are you?

Chat1: ^Elisa?Smiling "Pretty good. Running around as usual. I'm looking forward to the Block Party tomorrow! Even though I'll probably just be chasing my little sibs around looking after them."

s: ^Glad to hear it! Everyone I've talked to recently is either running a booth or stopping by for a few hours at least.
^Me too! Aw, hopefully you can drop them at Lila's child care for a little while so you can spend a little time with your friends.

Chat2: ^Elisa?Smiling "If I can help out, I will! Still have to see whether I need to work tomorrow morning or whether I can help set up."

s: ^It's no problem if you can't, just want you to be free to enjoy it!

Explain1: ^Elisa?Neutral "I hope so! Sometimes I wish I had an older sibling so I could be the youngest and run around and play."

s: ^They are lucky to have you. We talked earlier this week about that mentorship you were looking for, how is that working out?

Explain2: ^Elisa?Neutral "One of the girls and I connected, and she's great, but she lives the town over so I can't see her that much. I was hoping to find someone in Bloomwood."

s: ^Have you thought about reaching out to Lila? She's not first-gen, but she's definitely had a unique life.

Suggestion1: ^Elisa?Smiling "Are you sure she isn't too busy?"

s: ^She might be busy, but she's really good at making time for the people she cares about.

Suggestion2: ^Elisa_Day 4_Elisa wants to get to know Lila better, and is going to reach out this weekend to set up a coffee date_Lila4

Suggestion2.#: notification Elisa_Day 4_Elisa wants to get to know Lila better, and is going to reach out this weekend to set up a coffee date_Lila4

s: ^Nice! Lila's not the best at reaching out, otherwise I think she would have already. She sees a lot of herself in you. The chaos especially!

Goodbye: ^Elisa?Smiling "I look up to her so much! That's really reassuring to hear right now since I'm going through so much with my family and school."
^Elisa?Smiling "I have to go now, but I'll try to find her tomorrow and ask her to coffee. I'll see you later!"
